title: API Documenter Configuration
description: Describes how the API Documenter tool will process a project.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

outputTarget.description: Specifies what type of documentation will be generated

markdownOptions.description: Specifies what type of documentation will be generated

fileLevel.description: Specifies what level to output separated files until

indexBreadcrumbTitle.description: The text to show for the index/model in the breadcrumb

indexFilename.description: The filename to use for the index/model markdown file

indexTitle.description: The text to show for the main title of the index/model

showPropertyDefaults.description: Whether to show the default values for member properties

hideEmptyTableColumns.description: Whether to hide table columns when no cells in then have any values

showBreadcrumb.description: Whether to show the breadcrumb at the top of each markdown file

useIndex.description: Whether to output the index markdown file (and whether to include it in the breadcrumb)

indexBreadcrumbUrl.description: Allows a custom url to be used as the destination for the index in the breadcrumb (ignored if empty)

showRules.description: Whether to show horizontal rules between top level sections for the top file level child groups

newlineKind.description: Specifies what type of newlines API Documenter should use when writing output files.  By default, the output files will be written with Windows-style newlines.  To use POSIX-style newlines, specify "lf" instead. To use the OS's default newline kind, specify "os".

newDocfxNamespaces.description: This enables an experimental feature that will be officially released with the next major version of API Documenter.  It requires DocFX 2.46 or newer.  It enables documentation for namespaces and adds them to the table of contents.  This will also affect file layout as namespaced items will be nested under a directory for the namespace instead of just within the package.

plugins.description: Specifies plugin packages to be loaded

tableOfContents.description: Configures how the table of contents is generated.

showInheritedMembers.description: Specifies whether inherited members should also be shown on an API item's page.
